name: 爱了 爱了
content: 爱了就是种收获就是拥有
因为被爱伤透只好寂寞
你不试着忘伤痕不会走
你不张开手爱如何降落
Open up your arms and open up your soul
Ain't gonna cry to hide or to die
When love is gone just to say goodbye
Look upon the sky and you will see
Learn to love forget and forgive
Never look back will set you free
因为被爱伤透只好寂寞
你不试着忘伤痕不会走
你不张开手爱如何降落
